question: Which state the Vananchal Gramin Bank belongs to?
explanation: Vananchal Gramin Bank (VGB) is a Regional Rural Bank (RRB) in the state of Jharkhand. The bank was established on 30 June 2006 with the amalgamation of the erstwhile Santhal Parganas Gramin Bank and erstwhile Palamau Kshetriya Gramin Bank under the provisions of RRB Act 1976.
